description.p: NightPDF is a electron based application that allows one to read PDF files with dark mode. It has 3 default filters(monochrome, sepia & redeye) along with a option to generate a custom filter along with no filter. NightPDF has a simplistic design that makes it intuitive to use.

this has been a verrrrrrrrrrrrrryyyyyyy long time coming. I've tried several times with various approaches(Lunarequest/NightPDF-ng and Lunarequest/nightpdf-nx) I am happy to say these both approaches have been dropped for a much much simpler solution using tsc and rollup!
its been a hard journey getting to a typescript rewrite of NightPDF. I hope everyone can enjoy benefit from the rewrite
We switched to yarn berry aka yarn 3 this is a updated and maintained version yarn. Along with this using electron-updater we have auto updates
This release forces the readerview to appear in darkmode
This release updates electron to electron 21, and updates all dependencies
